page.title: 13MARYC.GOVERNMENT DISTRICT
page.content: Maryculter is part of Kincardine/ Deeside District in Grampian Region. The District Council has 12 members. Councillor Needham has represented our area since 1973,with a break 1978/79. Council business occupies 2 days a week.The Council deals with such things as Environmental Health,Housing and Property,Leisure,Recreation and Tourism, Planning and Development.The care of cemetries, collecting of refuse,inspection of food shops comes under Environmental Health.Listed buildings and conservation come under Planning and Development. Looking after parks, caravan sites, swimming pools has to do with Leisure and Recreation. Tourism is the biggest industry in Kincardine, employing most people.
